doc:
Tanya Berezin https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tanya_Berezin 0 Tanya Berezin (born March 25, 1941) is an American actress, co-founder and an artistic director of Circle Repertory Company in New York City, and educator. She has performed on Broadway and Off-Broadway, and has also appeared in a number of films and television series. Tanya_Berezin ( born March_25_,_1941 ) is an_American_actress , co-founder and an_artistic_director of Circle_Repertory_Company in New_York_City , and educator . She has_performed on Broadway_and_Off-Broadway , and has_also_appeared in a_number of films and television_series .
